nodes.text: Bazak's Gang was a pirate organization that operated in the Brak sector. Led by Lekk Bazak, the group was a collection of Rodians and Humans. They operated a Ghtroc Industries Class 720 freighter, the NightRunner, and two GAT-12j Skipray Blastboats, Slasher and Slicer. Bazak's Gang was allied with the Nalmar crime family.
